Articles.Content: hello, if i use the cupola module and put things on top of the small attachment node of the cupola, will the window of cupola be blocked in IVA view?

Part of me says "go found out yourself".

The other part says, "yes, placing things on the attachment node will block the view out the central circular window, but (if the item is small enough) you can still see out the angled windows."
You could test this in about 30 seconds by building a 2-part "ship" and sending it to the launch pad.
Yes, it will. For example if you put a medium sized docking mode, that window will become useless.
thx i tested it and the results are the same as u said. thanks so much!
